shapes3d.animation

Class TerrainCam

  • java.lang.Object
    • shapes3d.animation.Camera
      • shapes3d.animation.VCam
        • shapes3d.animation.TerrainCam

  • public class TerrainCam
extends VCam
    This class provides a simple camera that can be used with the Terrain class. The movement is in the XZ plane and rotation is about the Y axis.
    The nearZ value is much smaller than the default value in Processing to make sure the terrain is drawn right up to the camera position.
    Author:
    Peter Lager

    • Method Detail

      • adjustToTerrain

        public void adjustToTerrain(Terrain t,
                   int tMode,
                   float heightAbove)
        Will adjust the camera's position to ensure that it is over the terrain at a given height above it.
        Parameters:
        t - the terrain we want to use
        tMode - Terrain.CLAMP or Terrain.WRAP
        heightAbove - the height of the eye above the terrain
